newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Port conditions update - Australia - Lloyds.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions update - Australia - Lloyds.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

AUSTRALIA, July 25 - Westernport - Members of the MUA employed on tugs will be holding their bimonthly authorised stopwork meeting on Monday July 28 from 1000 hours to 1445 hrs. There will be no tugs available during this time.
Melbourne - The same people will be holding an equivalent stopwork meeting for the same time on Wednesday, July 30, again no tugs will be available during this time.
Geelong - The stopwork meeting in this port will be held on Thursday, July 31, for the same time span, identical conditions to that above apply.
